description: MainActivity.kt defines the main user interface of an Android TV application, including navigation, focus management, and content display with multiple horizontal rails and top menu.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Primary activity serving as the TV-style home screen with focusable menu, hero banner, and multiple content rails.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, binds UI components, and sets up navigation and focus.

methods.name: bindTopMenu
methods.description: Binds top menu TextViews and applies focus behaviors.

methods.name: bindHero
methods.description: Sets hero banner image and focus scaling.

methods.name: bindRails
methods.description: Initializes horizontal content rails with sample data and click behavior.

methods.name: setupMenuActions
methods.description: Defines click listeners for top menu items to navigate or show messages.

methods.name: toastClick
methods.description: Displays a toast message with the provided text.

methods.name: setupHorizontal
methods.description: Configures a RecyclerView as a horizontal list with an adapter and click handler.

methods.name: applyFocusScale
methods.description: Adds focus change animations to views for visual focus indication.

methods.name: nextThumb
methods.description: Returns a drawable resource for a given index cycling through a set of thumbnails.

methods.name: makeSampleContent
methods.description: Creates a list of sample ContentItem objects with sequential titles.

methods.name: makeSubscriptions
methods.description: Creates a list of subscription ContentItems.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Handles hardware key events; specifically, back button to finish activity.
